Package bond

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CheckedExcepter
    Interface used to specify an object that will return a checked exception.
    Doer
    Interface used to specify an object that will have some side effect.
    Excepter
    Interface used to specify an object that will return an exception.
    Filter
    Interface used to specify a custom filtering function to decide what observations a SpyAgent is applicable to.
    Resulter
    Interface used to specify an object that will return a result.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bond
    The main entrypoint to Bond, providing static methods to be used for observing the behavior of your program.
    BondTestRule
    A JUnit rule used to take care of setup and cleanup when using Bond with JUnit.
    Observation
    Class used to represent an observation.
    Serializer
    Class used to serialize objects into a JSON representation.
    SpyAgent
    Class representing an agent which can modify the behavior of spy points.
    SpyResult<T>
    A class used to hold the return values of spy points.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalSpyAgentException
    An exception thrown whenever an agent result or exception is requested (for example, through Bond.spy(String, Class)) and the agent that is found does not match the correct type.
